fields.name: Gaze of the Deep (C1)
fields.value: Even when Oz is not present in combat, he can still watch over Fischl through his raven eyes. When Fischl attacks an enemy, Oz fires a joint attack, dealing 22% of ATK DMG.

fields.name: Devourer of All-Sins (C2)
fields.value: When Nightrider is used, it deals an additional 200% ATK as DMG, and its AoE is increased by 50%.

fields.name: Wings of Nightmare (C3)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Nightrider by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Her Pilgrimage of Bleak (C4)
fields.value:
When Midnight Phatasmagoria is used, it deals 222% of ATK as Electro DMG to surrounding enemies.
When the skill duration ends, Fischl regenerates 20% of her HP.

fields.name: Against the Fleeing Light (C5)
fields.value:
Increase the Level of Midnight Phantasmagoria by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Evernight Raven (C6)
fields.value: Increases the duration of Oz's summoning by 2s. Additionally, Oz attacks with the current character when present, dealing 30% of Fischl's ATK as Electro DMG.

description: A mysterious girl who calls herself "Prinzessin der Verurteilung" and travels with a night raven named Oz.
title: Fischl
